about_the_game:
The capital calls for aid, and the people of Konvila will not stand alone. But after witnessing the horrifying scene of the commander's death, your army was routed. As the highest-ranking officer to survive, the responsibility falls to you, captain, to lead your people and reform the line.




The Banner of Blood is a medieval fantasy game infused with action and rogue-like elements. Players will find themselves up against the ever-growing forces of evil, relying on their courage and powerful relics to fend off formidable armies of foes.

  • Make your way through the vast orc-infested weald to reach the kingdom's heartland. Every journey will be unique and filled with challenges.
  • Regroup your scattered troops and recruit volunteers. You'll need anyone who can wield a weapon in the battles ahead.
  • Reclaim the relics lost in the chaos of war, as they hold the keys to victory.
  • Battle dreadful monsters that have joined forces with bloodlust-driven orcs.
  • Permadeath - You are strong, but not invincible. Even if you fall, your courage will pave the path for the next brave soul to take up the mantle.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violent animation and visual effects.

short_description: An ever-shifting action RPG rich with Rogue-like elements. Lead your troops across randomly generated battlefields as a commander. Clash blades with savage orcs, and call a hail of arrows to vanquish monstrous foes.
